description: a(n)=[A*a(n-1)+B*a(n-2)+C]/p^r, where p^r is the highest power of p dividing [A*a(n-1)+B*a(n-2)+C], A=1.0001, B=1.0001, C=1, p=2.
author: _Yasutoshi Kohmoto_
extensions: Becomes a cyclic sequence whose period is 4793. If A=1, B=1, C=0, p=1, a(1)=a(2)=1 then it is the Fibonacci Sequence.
